opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Mulvaney Mechanical, Inc. v. Sheet Metal Workers International Assn., Local 38

opinion:
538 U.S. 918

MULVANEY MECHANICAL, INC.
v.
SHEET METAL WORKERS INTERNATIONAL ASSN., LOCAL 38.

No. 02-924.

Supreme Court of United States.

March 24, 2003.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE SECOND CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. 2d Cir. Certiorari granted, judgment vacated, and case remanded for further consideration in light of Howsam v. Dean Witter Reynolds, Inc., 537 U. S. 79 (2002). Reported below: 288 F. 3d 491.
